rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks for helping with
all my selfish requests!

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I really owe you guys. After
all, it's thanks to you I
met KOS-MOS Re:, too!

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe we can go adventuring again
sometime! Like, after you're done
saving Alst and all that.

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0004
rows.name:
And you'd better bring KOS-MOS Re:
when we do! It's a promise, okay?

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0005
rows.name:
With the Assist Cores I made for
her equipped, KOS-MOS Re: ought
to be the ultimate Blade!

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Saving Alst will be child's
play with her on your side.

rows.label: tlk491001_01_msg0007
rows.name:
So you go take care of that, then
bring KOS-MOS Re: back to see me!
